div.h1: Welcome to Middleton Cross Plains Area School District

div.div: CSCS educator Rick Evans, Glacier Creek fifth-grade teacher Amy Weber, and Sunset Ridge kindergarten teacher Wendy Judd were among 20 area teachers to receive honorable mention recognition as part of...

strong.a: District to survey families on virtual learning

div.div: The District will send out a survey on Friday, April 24 asking families to answer a handful of questions about how virtual learning is going. The survey will be anonymous and available in English...

strong.a: MHS ranked 14th in state by USNWR

div.div: MHS was ranked the No. 2 high school in Dane County and the 14th best high school out of more than 550 in Wisconsin by U.S. News & World Report, according to a story posted on their website...
The Calendar Committee reviewed calendars from 12 comparable districts at its second meeting on Thursday, April 16. The meeting was held virtually due to COVID-19 concerns. The...

strong.a: Governor orders schools to remain closed

div.div: Governor Evers announced on Thursday, April 16 that all public and private K-12 schools will remain closed for the remainder of the 2019-20 school year. The announcement means that we will continue...
April 13-17 has been declared as Wisconsin's Tornado & Severe Weather Awareness Week. ReadyWisconsin, the National Weather Service, and Wisconsin Broadcasters Association encourage everyone...

strong.style: color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: 'Palatino Linotype', 'Book Antiqua', Palatino, serif; font-size: 14px;
strong.em: To educate all students to be contributing members of a global society byinspiringthem with a lifelong love of learning, challenging them with rigorous andinnovativecurriculum, and empowering them throughinclusionand collaboration.
